FuncDef: The hwtacacs-server template command creates an HWTACACS server template and enters the HWTACACS server template view. The undo hwtacacs-server template command deletes an HWTACACS server template. By default, no HWTACACS server template is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an HWTACACS server template.
HWTACACS server template name. The name contains only digits, letters, hyphens (-), underscores (_), and dots (.) within the specified length. The name cannot be - or --.

ExtraInfo: You can perform HWTACACS configurations, such as the configuration of authentication servers, authorization servers, accounting servers, and shared key, only after an HWTACACS server template is created.
